snippet: Sport directors, cycling’s version of head coaches, are tactical experts, media liaisons and psychologists speeding along in their Tour de France team cars.
abstract: Sport directors, cycling’s version of head coaches, are tactical experts, media liaisons and psychologists speeding along in their Tour de France team cars; Allan Peiper, sport director of the Garmin-Sharp team, is profiled.
lead_paragraph: Sport directors, cycling’s version of head coaches, are tactical experts, media liaisons and psychologists speeding along in their Tour de France team cars.

headline.seo: No Respite in Getting Tour de France Riders to Finish
headline.main: No Respite in Getting Tour Riders to Finish Line
headline.print_headline: For Sport Directors, No Respite in Getting Riders to Tour’s Finish
